ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kaesora trouble
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh thanks :)  Its Veeshan (which explains all the Japanese people being there, heh) A lvl one iksar would absorb one attack, heh, my lvl 8 iksar would do the
ygData.messageBody:
Heh thanks :) Its Veeshan (which explains all the Japanese people being
there, heh)

A lvl one iksar would absorb one attack, heh, my lvl 8 iksar would do the
same...

Thanks to all who have (or will) reply, I am formulated a few plans in my
head.

1. Get enough people to clear the room (obviously best option)
2. Get a guide to help (and I always try to be in character or friendly
when i talk to them)
3. Log on, screech and cross my fingers.
3a. Get a lesser group to help my Cr from hopefully an esier spot.
4. Go down the shore house and wait for option 1.
